content: gilet court d été by marie-adeline boyer a simple top down cardigan knitted in one piece quick to knit it s almost done when you ll bind off with no finishing after waving in ends choose a pretty button and voilà it is a perfect every day garnement the basic you can wear with almost all your wardrobe un cardigan tout simple tricoté top down en une seule pièce rapide à réaliser sans coutures une fois les fils rentrés vous n avez plus qu à choisir un beau bouton et voilà vous avez un joli cardigan facile à porter et qui va avec presque toute votre garde-robe directions in english page 2 instructions en français page 3 marie adeline boyer all rights reserved 2010 www marieadelinetricoteknits com marieadelineboyer@gmail com skill level directions 2 beginner yoke abbreviations k knit co 80 80 80 88 88 88 sts do not join kfb k into front and back of st work 6 row in garter st p purl next row work to the last 6 sts make a 3 sts one row button- pm place marker st s stitch es hole k3 st st stockinette stitch work 4 more row in garter st next row k15 15 15 16 16 16 pm k10 10 10 12 12 sizes 12 pm k30 30 30 32 32 32 pm k10 10 10 12 12 sizes xs s m l xl xxl 12 pm k15 15 15 16 16 16 row 1 k to 2 sts before the marker kfb k1 slip marker finished chest measurements kfb k to 2 sts before the marker kfb k1 slip marker kfb k 30 34 38 42 46 50 inches to 2 sts before the marker kfb k1 slip marker kfb k to 2 sts gauge before the marker kfb k1 slip marker kfb k to the end of row 20 sts = 4 inches in st st row 2 k7 purl to the last 7 sts k7 needle repeat last 2 row 10 14 18 22 26 30 more times or us 8 5mm 32 circular needle until sleeves almost meet at the underarm or size needed to get work one inch in st st maintening 7 sts each side in garter st gauge us 8 5mm double-poin- ted needles or size needed to get body separating the sleeves gauge next row k 26 30 34 38 40 44 for the right front slip yarn 32 40 48 56 64 72 80 sleeve sts onto scrap yarn cast on noro taiyo aran / 10 ply 100g = 8 sts on right-hand needle k 52 60 68 76 82 90 98 sts 220 yards 201 meters 400 440 for the back slip 32 40 48 56 64 72 80 sleeve sts onto 480 520 560 600 yards 380 scrap yarn cast on 8 sts on right-hand needle k 26 30 34 420 460 500 540 580 m 38 40 44 for the left front notions work straight in st
